text:
Hello HubSpotters,

I’m Mike, a software engineer for over 30 years with lots of experience creating apps for companies small and large  (Amazon, EMC, Harvard Medical School, Bloomberg, RSA…).

Expert in User interface design, mobile and web app development (Angular, React, Android Native, ReactNative, NativeScript, Flutter), REST, GCP & AWS,  Typescript/Javascript, Java, DevOps….

I’m creating integration apps HubSpot for an industrial components company.  I’m hoping to smooth that way in this group.  So far the HS APIs seem flaky to me, I hope to use them better.

Hello everyone!
Just looking to fix some issues and learn a little about developing in CMS
